data.message: i'm an Iranian and i wanted to show some love to my idol! i just heard some shit about people hating and shit, and i just wanted to clear this out, people Love Em here! some fuckers do these kinda shit to mess up our image in the worlds eyes. We are huge fans obviously! Em is the Best  rapper in my life time Period! so, just wanted to say #IranLovesEminem and skip through the hate; it aint real and its not true. #love #respect
